channel.title: Boundary on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Boundary on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-93 South - Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome to Nevada on US-93 south, at the Idaho-Nevada border.

item.title: Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome to Nevada - The Silver State on NV-319 west. Taken at the Utah-Nevada State Line.

item.title: I-86 West - Fort Hall Indian Reservation
item.description: Entering the Fort Hall Indian Reservation on I-86 west.

item.title: US-30 West - Entering Caribou County
item.description: Entering Caribou County on US-30 west.

item.title: CA-210 West - San Bernardino City Limit
item.description: San Bernardino City Limit on CA-210 west. San Bernardino is the county seat of San Bernardino County.

item.title: Welcome To California - I-40 West
item.description: Welcome to California on I-40 west at the Arizona-California state line crossing the Colorado River. San Bernardino County line.

item.title: US-60 West - Entering Show Low
item.description: Entering Show Low on US-60 west. Elevation 6,331, founded in 1870.

item.title: US-191 South/AZ-61 West - Entering St. Johns
item.description: Entering St. Johns on US-191 South/AZ-61 West. Elevation 5725 Feet. Founded in 1874. St. Johns is the county seat of Apache County.

item.title: NM-602 South - Entering Zuni Reservation
item.description: Entering Zuni Reservation on NM-602 south.

item.title: I-40 East - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome to New Mexico - The Land of Enchantment on I-40 eastbound.

item.title: I-40 East - New Mexico State Line
item.description: New Mexico State Line on I-40 east.

item.title: I-84 East - Umatilla Indian Reservation
item.description: Entering the Umatilla Indian Reservation on I-84 east.

item.title: Welcome To California - US-97 South
item.description: Welcome to California on US-97 south. Siskiyou County Line. Taken at the Oregon-California border.

item.title: Welcome To Utah on UT-30 West
item.description: Welcome to Utah on UT-30 west at the Utah-Wyoming Border. This sign is part of a new series of welcome signs for Utah, in which each region has a unique welcome sign.

item.title: End WY-430 South - Leaving Wyoming
item.description: Leaving Wyoming at the southern end of WY-430 South. Taken at the Wyoming-Colorado State Line.

item.title: Welcome To Wyoming
item.description: Welcome To Wyoming on WY-430 North at the Wyoming-Colorado State Line.

item.title: Welcome To Utah - Browns Park
item.description: Welcome to Utah on CH-1364 (Browns Park Road). This welcome sign was posted by the Utah Division of Wildlife Resources. Continue west on Browns Park Road for US-191.

item.title: Welcome To Colorful Colorado
item.description: Welcome to Colorful Colorado on CO-318 East, at the Utah-Colorado State Line.

item.title: Utah State Line on CR-1364
item.description: Utah State Line on CR-1364 (Browns Park Road) at the Wyoming-Utah Border. There is a cattle guard marking the state line.

item.title: Welcome To Utah on UT-43 West
item.description: Welcome to Utah on UT-43 West. The new Utah welcome signs have a different logo for each region of the State. The logo in this region is a Dinosaur. Taken at the Utah-Wyoming State Line.

item.title: I-80 East - Welcome To Wyoming
item.description: Welcome to Wyoming - Forever West, on I-80 east. Taken at the Utah-Wyoming State Line.

item.title: I-80 East - Utah State Line
item.description: Utah State Line on I-80 east at the Utah-Nevada border. A fancier welcome sign is just east of here. The Utah-Nevada border along I-80 is home to the twin towns of Wendover (Utah) and West Wendover (Nevada). The Nevada side has many large casinos.

item.title: US-93 South - Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome to Nevada on US-93 south, at the Idaho-Nevada border.

item.title: I-15 South - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on I-15 south at the Idaho-Montana stateline on Monida Pass.

item.title: I-15 South - Entering Clark County
item.description: I-15 south Entering Clark Count and Leaving Montana. Taken on Monida Pass on the Continental Divide between Idaho and Montana.

item.title: Welcome To Montana - I-15 North
item.description: Welcome to Montana on I-15 North at the Idaho-Montana state line on Monida Pass. Monida Pass is the Continental Divide.

item.title: ID-61 North - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on ID-61 north. The Wyoming milemarker for WY-89 is attached to the sign.

item.title: WY-89 South - Welcome To Wyoming
item.description: Welcome To Wyoming On WY-89 South. This is the new style of welcome sign in Wyoming. Taken on the Wyoming-Idaho border.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - US-91 North
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-91 North.

item.title: US-91 North - Historic Byway Information
item.description: Pioneer Historic Byway information on US-91 north approaching the Idaho State line. Pioneer Historic Byway is within the state of Idaho.

item.title: I-84 East - Welcome To Utah
item.description: Welcome to Utah on I-84 east at the Utah-Idaho state line.

item.title: US-95 North - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-95 north at the Oregon-Idaho State Line.

item.title: US-95 North - Oregon Thanks You
item.description: Oregon Thanks You Come Back Soon on US-95 north.

item.title: US-95 North - Rome
item.description: Entering the rural community of Rome on US-95 north.

item.title: US-50 West - Welcome To California
item.description: Welcome to California on US-50 west at the California-Nevada state line. Entering South Lake Tahoe.

item.title: I-10 West - Welcome To California
item.description: Welcome to California on I-10 West/US-95 north, just west of the California State Agricultural Inspection Station. Entering Pacific Time Zone.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 243
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 243 - Riviera Drive. Taken upon leaving the California State Agricultural Inspection Station.

item.title: I-10 West - California State Line
item.description: California State Line on I-10 west crossing the Colorado River, at the Arizona-California Border.

item.title: AZ-78 West - Welcome To Arizona
item.description: Welcome to Arizona on AZ-78 west at the Arizona-New Mexico State Line.

item.title: NM-78 East - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome to New Mexico on NM-78 east. Begin DOT Maintenance.

item.title: I-10 East - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome to New Mexico on I-10 east. Taken at the Arizona-New Mexico State Line.

item.title: I-8 East - Welcome To Arizona
item.description: I-8 east - Welcome To Arizona. The welcome sign is about a mile inside of Arizona after Exit 1. There is a smaller welcome sign on the Colorado River bridge at the actual state line.

item.title: I-8 East - Arizona State Line
item.description: Arizona State Line, Yuma County Line, and Yuma City Limits on the Colorado River bridge at the Arizona-California State Line.
